summary: Bruce Lee is universally recognized as the pioneer who elevated martial arts in film to an art form, and this documentary will reveal why Bruce Lee's flame burns brighter now than the day he died over three decades ago.
cast: Bruce Lee|Paul Bowman|Daniele Bolelli|Richard Bustillo|Kareem Abdul-Jabbar|Muhammad Ali|Robert Baker|Jon T. Benn|Pierre Berton|Stephan Bonnar|J.J. Brine|Kobe Bryant|Linda Lee Cadwell|Gina Carano|Robert Clouse|James Coburn|Bernard Cowan|Clint Eastwood|James Garner|Royce Gracie|Jimi Hendrix|Reginald Hudlin|Dan Inosanto|Diana Lee Inosanto|Jon Jones|Jim Kelly|Cung Le|Gene LeBell|Brandon Lee|Shannon Lee|Ray 'Boom Boom' Mancini|Charles Manson|Steve McQueen|Nora Miao|Chuck Norris|Ed O'Neill|Manny Pacquiao|Roman Polanski|Paul Rodriguez|Mickey Rourke|Jose Ruiz III|John Saxon|Kien Shih|Taboo|David Tadman|Sharon Tate|Teri Tom|Robert Wall|Dana White|Van Williams|Maria Yi|Jackie Chan
title: I Am Bruce Lee
